mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T01_GENEALOGY ( FIRST_NAME , ARMS , VIDEO , INFOMATION , OWNER_ID , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{firstName} , #{arms} , #{video} , #{infomation} , #{ownerID} , #{createDate} , #{createTime} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T01_GENEALOGY SET FIRST_NAME = #{firstName} , ARMS = #{arms} , VIDEO = #{video} , INFOMATION = #{infomation} , OWNER_ID = #{ownerID} , CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} , CREATE_TIME = #{createTime} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , FIRST_NAME AS "firstName" , ARMS AS "arms" , VIDEO AS "video" , INFOMATION AS "infomation" , OWNER_ID AS "ownerID" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T01_GENEALOGY WHERE ID = #{iD}

SELECT ID AS "iD" , FIRST_NAME AS "firstName" , ARMS AS "arms" , VIDEO AS "video" , INFOMATION AS "infomation" , OWNER_ID AS "ownerID" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T01_GENEALOGY WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "iD" , FIRST_NAME AS "firstName" , ARMS AS "arms" , VIDEO AS "video" , INFOMATION AS "infomation" , OWNER_ID AS "ownerID" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T01_GENEALOGY WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
